categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle at Sluis Van final battle between the New Republic and the forces of Warlord Sander Delvardus in 5.5 ABY.

After the unsuccessful attack of Delvardus on Sullust, the New Republic led by the Sullustan captain Sien Sovv launched a counterattack campaign for the control of territories of the Eriadu Authority.
The battle was described as a "merciless assault".
After this battle, Delvardus abandoned the Seswenna sector and fled in the Deep Core.
